name: ProgressKind
desc: An object that represents the kind of progress.

items.name: init(String)
items.desc: Creates a new kind of progress using the specified string.

items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Creates a new kind of progress using the raw value of a string you specify.

items.name: static let file: ProgressKind
items.desc: The value that indicates that the progress is tracking a file operation.
